com.mumfrey.liteloader.client

Class LiteLoaderPanelManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mumfrey.liteloader.client.LiteLoaderPanelManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Observer, PostRenderObserver, TickObserver, PanelManager<GuiScreen>

    public class LiteLoaderPanelManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements PanelManager<GuiScreen>
    Observer which handles the display of the mod panel
    Author:
    Adam Mummery-Smith
